title: Calories in a Mini Hershey Bar
meta_description: Learn calories in mini Hershey bar: about 42 kcal per piece, plus carbs, sugars, fat, and full nutrition details for easy tracking.
h1: Calories in a Mini Hershey Bar
assumptions: Standard Hershey's milk chocolate mini bar, ~8.5 g each, solid chocolate without fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact size, and flavor; values based on standard Hershey's minis. Check packaging for precise info.

quick_answer.text: One mini Hershey bar contains about 42 calories, mostly from sugar and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Dark chocolate mini instead of milk

faqs.q: How many calories in one mini Hershey bar?
faqs.a: Approximately 42 kcal for a standard milk chocolate mini.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a mini Hershey bar?
faqs.a: About 5.2 g total carbs, including 4.6 g sugars and 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a mini Hershey bar high in fat?
faqs.a: It has 2.4 g total fat, with 1.5 g saturated; moderate for a small treat.

faqs.q: How much protein in calories in mini Hershey bar?
faqs.a: Only 0.5 g protein per mini, as it's primarily chocolate.

faqs.q: Do mini Hershey bars have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in standard varieties.
